title: 88/19/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 December 1987 amending Decision 86/78/EEC approving a programme for the fishery sector (1985 to 1990), submitted by the Netherlands in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 18 December 1987
amending Decision 86/78/EEC approving a programme for the fishery sector (1985 to 1990), submitted by the Netherlands in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Dutch text is authentic)
(88/19/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The second sentence of Article 1 of Decision 86/78/EEC is hereby deleted.
2. The third subparagraph of paragraph 1 of Annex II to Decision 86/78/EEC is hereby deleted.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1987.
For the Commission
Antรณnio CARDOSO E CUNHA
Member of the Commission
